articles.author: Aditi Raja, Ritu Sharma
articles.title: 20 suspected Chandipura virus deaths in Gujarat, CM reviews situation - The Indian Express
articles.description: A review meeting undertaken by Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel with district health officials on Thursday discussed the precautions that are to be taken to curb the spread of the virus.
articles.content: The toll in suspected cases of Chandipura Viral Encephalitis (CHPV) rose to 20 in Gujarat on Thursday, including two deaths reported from Ahmedabad city, even as 35 people showing symptoms of CHPV ar… [+6003 chars]

articles.description: NEET-UG case: AIIMS Patna executive director and CEO, Dr Gopal Krushna Pal said that no doctor has been arrested. | Latest News India

articles.title: Express Break: Stalin’s son Udhayanidhi to be elevated as Tamil Nadu deputy CM, move aimed to ease burden on CM - The Indian Express
